generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road surface extending into the distance, with visible lane markings and curbs on both sides.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible on the right side of the road, bordered by a curb and adjacent to a stone wall.
- wall: A stone wall runs along the right side of the sidewalk, clearly identifiable as an individual standing wall.
- pole: A metal pole with traffic signs attached is visible on the left side of the road.
- traffic sign: Traffic signs are mounted on the pole on the left side of the road.
- vegetation: Numerous trees and greenery are visible along both sides of the road and in the background.
- terrain: Grass and soil areas are visible on the left side of the road and in the background, as well as along the sidewalk.
- person: A person can be seen walking on the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
- car: The Mercedes-Benz logo on the hood indicates the presence of a car, and a car is visible in the distance on the right side of the road.
